name: Broccoli Mushroom Casserole
ingredients: 2 16-ounce bags frozen broccoli cuts, cooked and well drained

instructions.en: Cook frozen broccoli cuts according to package instructions and drain well
instructions.sk: Uvarte mrazenú nakrájanú brokolicu podľa pokynov na obale a dobre sceďte
instructions.ja: 冷凍ブロッコリーをパッケージの指示通りに調理し、よく水気を切る

instructions.en: In the same pot, sauté chopped onion, minced celery, and drained canned mushrooms in butter until soft
instructions.sk: V tom istom hrnci opražte na masle nakrájanú cibuľu, nasekaný zeler a scedené konzervované huby do mäkka
instructions.ja: 同じ鍋で、みじん切りにした玉ねぎとセロリ、水気を切った缶詰のキノコをバターで柔らかくなるまで炒める

instructions.en: Mix all ingredients in a greased 2-quart casserole dish
instructions.sk: Zmiešajte všetky ingrediencie vo vymastenej 2-litrovej zapekacej miske
instructions.ja: すべての材料を油を塗った2クォートのキャセロール皿に混ぜ合わせる
